Title: The Rescue of Meredy Huntswell
Description:
Our expedition's mage, Meredy Huntswell, is being held by the harpies!

We've got to stop their ritual and rescue Meredy.

You lead the charge. Kee-La and I will back you up if things look dire.
ObjectivesText: Rescue Meredy Huntswell from the harpy's necromantic ritual.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Meredy Huntswell at the Harpy Roost entrance.
RewardText: Ye rescued me from a grim fate! Bein' a practicin' mage, I always figured one of me own spells would do me in, not a harpy!
